0.text: Bug 21523  StyledText - caret does not move when widget shell is not open.

1.text: build R2.0  The caret does not move horizontally when the widget has not been made visible  yet (i.e., its shell has not been opened) and API is called that should move  the caret.

2.text: To reproduce add the line  	text.invokeAction(ST.COLUMN_NEXT);  to the SwtStyledTextUseCase.createWorkRegion Observe that the caret is still at offset 0 when the user case is started.

3.text: When  cursor next is pressed the caret is at offset 2.

4.text: The problem is that StyledText.showLocation returns scroll == true when  horizontal scroll was called even if the horizontal scroll does not actually  occur because the passed scroll distance is 0.
